caption.p: Supplementary material Supplementary data associated with this article is contained in excel files (Tables S1 and S2) and can be found in the online version at. The estimated ranges in raster format are available at www.albertinerift.org. Table S2. Excel file comparing the current range size, area cultivated, predicted range contractions under climate change for 20 bird species for CMIP3 and CMIP5.
